cockatrice_carddatabase.cards:
Hoarding Squirrel MJS B 2B 3 Creature - Squirrel 3/2 2 When Hoarding Squirrel enters the battlefield, choose one — • Create a Food token. • Autumn begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.)
Wizards of First Frost MJS U 3U 4 Creature - Human Wizard 3/3 2 When Wizards of First Frost enters the battlefield, choose one — • Target player mills four cards. • Winter begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.)
Trail Mix MJS G G 1 Sorcery 3 Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Emergency Flare MJS R 1RR 3 Sorcery 3 Emergency Flare deals 2 damage to any target. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Star Chart MJS U 1U 2 Sorcery 3 Scry 1, then draw a card. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Trumpeting Conch MJS R R 1 Sorcery 3 Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Netting Trap MJS W 1W 2 Instant 3 Tap up to two target creatures. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Bug Collector MJS W 3W 4 Creature - Human Cleric 3/3 2 When Bug Collector enters the battlefield, exile up to one target creature card from your graveyard with mana value 3 or less and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Burying Blizzard MJS U 4U 5 Instant 3 Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner’s library. If it’s winter, put it into its owner’s library fourth from the top instead.
Stasis Squall MJS U U 1 Instant 3 Tap target creature. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Seashore Scavenger MJS U 4U 5 Creature - Bird 3/3 2 Flying When Seashore Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Animated Carving MJS B 1B 2 Sorcery 3 Mill two cards. When you do, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)

1 1 Instant 3 Scry 2. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Beset Explorers MJS R 3R 4 Creature - Human Ranger 5/2 2 When Beset Explorers enters the battlefield, you may discard a card or put a card in your rucksack into your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.
Thirty-Foot Python MJS G 2G 3 Creature - Snake 3/3 2 Exaggerate 5GG (You may cast this spell by tapping an untapped creature you control and paying the exaggerate cost reduced by that creature’s power.) Thirty-Foot Python enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if it was exaggerated.
Burst of Confidence MJS W W 1 Instant 3 Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Climactic Clash MJS G 1G 2 Instant 3 Exaggerate 7G (You may cast this spell by tapping an untapped creature you control and paying the exaggerate cost reduced by that creature’s power.) Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. If this spell was exaggerated, put two +1/+1 counters on the creature you control before it fights.
Rapid Adaptation MJS G G 1 Instant 3 Exaggerate 2G (You may cast this spell by tapping an untapped creature you control and paying the exaggerate cost reduced by that creature’s power.) Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn. If this spell was exaggerated, that creature also gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Goldmane Lion MJS R 3R 4 Creature - Cat 4/3 2 Exaggerate 5RR (You may cast this spell by tapping an untapped creature you control and paying the exaggerate cost reduced by that creature’s power.) When Goldmane Lion enters the battlefield, if it was exaggerated, add RRR.
The One That Got Away MJS U U 1 Creature - Fish 1/1 2 Exaggerate 6U (You may cast this spell by tapping an untapped creature you control and paying the exaggerate cost reduced by that creature’s power.) The One That Got Away can’t be blocked. The One That Got Away enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if it was exaggerated.
Oaken Congregation MJS G 1G 2 Sorcery 3 Exaggerate 7GG (You may cast this spell by tapping an untapped creature you control and paying the exaggerate cost reduced by that creature’s power.) Create two 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens. If this spell was exaggerated, create four of those tokens instead.
Dire Starvation MJS B 2B 3 Sorcery 3 Exaggerate 4BB (You may cast this spell by tapping an untapped creature you control and paying the exaggerate cost reduced by that creature’s power.) Target opponent discards two cards. If this spell was exaggerated, that player loses 4 life.
Harvestblight MJS B 2B 3 Instant 3 Autumn begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.) Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Beasttamer's Whistle MJS G 1G 2 Sorcery 3 Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand, then put the rest into your graveyard.
Summer Hares MJS R 1R 2 Creature - Rabbit 2/1 2 When Summer Hares enters the battlefield, choose one — • Summer Hares gains haste until end of turn. • Summer begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.)

(Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.) Whenever you endure a season, Weathered Greatoak gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
Hibernating Grizzly MJS G 2GG 4 Creature - Bear 5/5 2 When Hibernating Grizzly enters the battlefield, winter begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.) Hibernating Grizzly can’t attack or block during winter.
Iceberg Looters MJS U 1U 2 Creature - Human Scout 1/3 2 When Iceberg Looters enters the battlefield, winter begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.) 1U, T: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Banish to the Mist MJS W 2WW 4 Enchantment 1 Ward 2 (Whenever this enchantment becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2.) When Banish to the Mist enters the battlefield, exile target creature or planeswalker until Banish to the Mist leaves the battlefield.
Careful Campers MJS W 1WW 3 Creature - Dwarf Scout 0/4 2 Careful Campers gets +1/+0 for each card type among permanents you control.
Harvest Hands MJS W 1W 2 Sorcery 3 Autumn begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.) Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

Rucksack Thief MJS W 1W 2 Creature - Raccoon 2/2 2 Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Rucksack Thief.
Pair-Bonded Azures MJS U 2U 3 Creature - Bird 2/2 2 Flying When Pair-Bonded Azures enters the battlefield, summer begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.) Whenever you endure a season, Pair-Bonded Azures gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Lumbering Humpbacks MJS U 1U 2 Creature - Whale 0/5 2 As long as a library has twenty or fewer cards in it, Lumbering Humpbacks gets +5/+0.
Midnight Sun MJS R 4R 5 Instant 3 This spell costs 3 less to cast during summer. Midnight Sun deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Break New Ground MJS G 2G 3 Sorcery 3 Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If it’s spring, create a 2/2 green Plant creature token.
Aviomorphosis MJS U U 1 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature is a blue Bird with base power and toughness 1/1, has flying, and loses all other abilities.
Sporeback Capuchin MJS G 1G 2 Creature - Monkey 1/3 2 When Sporeback Capuchin enters the battlefield, choose one — • You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. • Spring begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.)

Frostspawn Recluse MJS G 2G 3 Creature - Spider 4/2 2 This spell costs 2 less to cast during winter. Reach

Witch of the Willows MJS B 1BB 3 Creature - Human Warlock 2/3 2 As long is your life total is greater than an opponent’s, Witch of the Willows gets +2/+0. 1, T: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Viper of Mount Petra MJS R 1R 2 Creature - Snake 1/2 2 1RR: Viper of Mount Petra gets +3/+0 until end of turn. This ability costs 1 less to activate if you have one or fewer cards in hand.
Journeykit MJS G G 1 Creature - Squirrel 1/1 2 When Journeykit enters the battlefield, spring begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.) Whenever winter becomes spring, put two +1/+1 counters on Journeykit.
Everknock Scout MJS R 2R 3 Creature - Human Archer Scout 2/3 2 Reach The second spell you cast each turn costs 1 less to cast.
Daily Rations MJS W W 1 Instant 3 Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. Create a Food token. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
The Bare Necessities MJS R 1R 2 Sorcery 3 Discard two cards, then draw two cards. If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it and add it to your rucksack. (When you cast a noncreature spell, you may cast spells from your rucksack. You still pay their costs.)
Wayward Sunwitch MJS R 2R 3 Creature - Human Wizard 3/2 2 When Wayward Sunwitch enters the battlefield, summer begins. (Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.) Whenever you discard a card, Wayward Sunwitch deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Campfire Confrontation MJS W 1W 2 Instant 3 Destroy target tapped creature.
Mantle of the Scarecrow MJS W W 1 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance and reach. Sacrifice a Food: Return Mantle of the Scarecrow from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

When Pontega Brackish enters the battlefield, if it was exaggerated, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner’s hand.

Fling MJS R 1R 2 Instant 3 As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature’s power to any target.
Resourceful Forager MJS W 2W 3 Creature - Human Peasant 2/3 2 When Resourceful Forager enters the battlefield, create a Food token. Whenever you sacrifice a Food, Resourceful Forager gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Flying, vigilance When Cursebreaker Owl enters the battlefield, if it was exaggerated, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.
Mesa Dilinos MJS W 4W 5 Creature - Beast 4/4 2 When Mesa Dilinos enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control ten or more permanents, they also gain vigilance and indestructible until end of turn.
Dashing Fox MJS R R 1 Creature - Fox 1/1 2 Haste Sacrifice Dashing Fox: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
Barging Buffalo MJS R 4R 5 Creature - Ox 4/5 2 Exaggerate 7RR (You may cast this spell by tapping an untapped creature you control and paying the exaggerate cost reduced by that creature’s power.) Mammoth Harbinger MJS G 4GG 6 Creature - Elephant 7/5 2 When Mammoth Harbinger enters the battlefield, the season of your choice begins. (The seasons are winter, spring, summer, and autumn. Players may endure the current season once per turn to draw a card and begin the next season.)

Oakenform MJS G 2G 3 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If this spell was exaggerated, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures your opponents control instead.

Hallows' Culling MJS B 1B 2 Instant 3 Target player sacrifices a creature. If it’s autumn, that player loses 3 life.

Deathtouch Cavern Scorpions enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if it was exaggerated.

The Seasons MJS
1 Endure the current season: Draw a card. The next season begins. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn. • Spring—3. • Summer—Discard a card. • Autumn—Sacrifice an artifact or creature. • Winter—Exile four cards from your graveyard. 1
